name: adventurelog
description: AdventureLog is a web-based adventure journaling app where users can track their travels, add stories, locations and timelines. It supports rich posts with media and is ideal for self-hosted digital travel diaries and adventure logs.

features.title: Digital Travel Diary
features.description: Comprehensive logs for documenting every adventure and journey. Preserve your memories forever

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Attach photos, videos, and files to enhance your memories. Bring your adventures to life

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep travel memories on your own server infrastructure. Complete privacy guaranteed

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Tags and categories make finding past adventures effortless. Never lose a memory

features.title: Intuitive Interface
features.description: Easy-to-use web design for browsing and reliving experiences. Navigate your adventures smoothly
